steps.description: 1. Fill the empty cell that is orthogonally surrounded by the four green (3) cells at positions (1,2), (2,1), (2,3), (3,2) with color 4.
2. Fill the empty cell that is orthogonally surrounded by the four green (3) cells at positions (2,3), (3,2), (3,4), (4,3) with color 4.
3. Do not change any other cells (leave all existing green (3) cells and the black background (0) unchanged).
